name: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual Collector's Edition
description: A series of mysterious ritual murders covered the foggy streets of London, which young detective James Voodoo will have to investigate. While investigating these mysterious murders, James Voodoo faces the mystical phenomena, which covered the city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
